Feature.Description: General device software and hardware information can be retrieved and changed within this function. By Valeryia Sidarava, Institute of Biochemical Engineering, Technical University of Munich, 31.07.2019 and Lukas Bromig, Institute of Biochemical Engineering, Technical University of Munich, 15.04.2020

Property.Description: Get the current status of the device from the internal state machine of the SiLA server.

Command.Description: Get the current status of the device from the state machine of the SiLA server.

Response.Description: The current log level of the latest logs , retrieved from the SiLA server log file.
The current log timestamp of the latest logs , retrieved from the SiLA server log file.
The current log level of the latest logs , retrieved from the SiLA server log file.

Command.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Pump Address succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Set the language of the pump.

Parameter.Description: Gets the pump, on which the command will be executed
The language of the pump. 0=English / 1=French / 2=Spanish / 3=German.

Response.Description: Language of the pump succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get The language of the pump. 0=English / 1=French / 2=Spanish / 3=German.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Current language of the pump. 0=English / 1=French / 2=Spanish / 3=German.

Command.Description: Get pump status. +=running, -=stopped/standby.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Current pump status. +=running, -=stopped/standby.

Command.Description: Get pump information. Response is string of model description (variable length), software version (3 digits) and pump head model type code (3 digits).

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Current pump information. Response is string of model description (variable length), software version (3 digits) and pump head model type code (3 digits).

Command.Description: Get pump software version. Response is string.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Current pump software version. Response is string.

Command.Description: Get pump serial number.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Pump serial number query.

Command.Description: Set whether (1) or not (0) channel addressing is enabled.

Parameter.Description: Gets the pump, on which the command will be executed
Set whether (1) or not (0) channel addressing is enabled.

Response.Description: Channel Addressing of the pump succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get information whether (1) or not (0) channel addressing is enabled.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Information whether or not channel addressing is enabled String of form XXXXXXX; 0=disabled,1=enabled.

Command.Description: Set whether (1) or not (0) event messages are enabled.

Parameter.Description: Gets the pump, on which the command will be executed
Set whether (1) or not (0) event messages are enabled.

Response.Description: Event Messages of the pump succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get information whether (1) or not (0) event messages are enabled.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: information whether or not event messages are enabled; 0=disabled,1=enabled.

Command.Description: Get an integer representing the version of the serial protocol.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Integer representing the version of the serial protocol.

Command.Description: Set pump name for display under remote control string.

Parameter.Description: Gets the address, on which the command will be executed
Set pump name for display under remote control string.

Response.Description: Pump Name succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get number of pump channels.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Number of pump channels

Command.Description: Set number of pump channels.

Parameter.Description: Gets the pump, on which the command will be executed
Set number of pump channels.

Response.Description: Channel Number succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get total number of revolutions.

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get total number of revolutions

Command.Description: Get channel total volume pumped since last reset, mL.

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Channel total volume pumped since last reset, mL

Command.Description: Get total time pumped for a channel since last reset, mL.

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get total time pumped for a channel since last reset, mL.

Command.Description: Get pump head model type code indicating the ID number of the pump head. The first two digits encode the number of channels on the head, and the second 2 digits represent the number of rollers.

Parameter.Description: Set the address of the pump (1-8).

Response.Description: Get pump head model type code indicating the ID number of the pump head. The first two digits encode the number of channels on the head, and the second 2 digits represent the number of rollers.

Command.Description: Set pump head model type code up to 4 digits indicating the ID number of the pump head. The first two digits encode the number of channels on the head, and the second 2 digits represent the number of rollers

Parameter.Description: Gets the pump, on which the command will be executed
Set pump head model type code indicating the ID number of the pump head. The first two digits encode the number of channels on the head, and the second 2 digits represent the number of rollers

Response.Description: Head Model succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Set control from the pump user interface

Parameter.Description: Set control from the pump user interface. Variable - pump address

Response.Description: User Interface succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Disable pump user interface

Parameter.Description: Disable pump user interface. Variable - pump address

Response.Description: Disable Interface succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Write numbers to the pump to display while under external control - string (less than 17 characters)

Parameter.Description: Gets the pump, on which the command will be executed
Write numbers to the pump to display while under external control - string (less than 17 characters)

Response.Description: Display Numbers succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Write letters to the pump to display while under external control - string (less than 17 characters)

Parameter.Description: Gets the pump, on which the command will be executed
Write letters to the pump to display while under external control - string (less than 17 characters)

Response.Description: Display Letters succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get current setting for pump time in 1/10 seconds.

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get current setting for pump time in 1/10 seconds.

Command.Description: Set current setting for pump time in 1/10 seconds.

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set current setting for pump time in 1/10 seconds.

Response.Description: Time Setting succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Set current run time setting for dispensing in minutes (0-999)

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set current run time setting for dispensing in minutes (0-999)

Response.Description: Run Time succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Set current run time setting for dispensing in hours (0-999)

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set current run time setting for dispensing in hours (0-999)

Response.Description: Run Time succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get current setting for volume to pump in low order roller steps. The total number of roller steps which are dispensed during an operation is computed as [ u*65536 + U].

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get current setting for volume to pump in low order roller steps. The total number of roller steps which are dispensed during an operation is computed as [ u*65536 + U].

Command.Description: Set current setting for volume to pump in roller steps (0 - 65536).

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set current setting for volume to pump in roller steps (0 - 65536).

Response.Description: Roller Steps low order succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get current setting for volume to pump in high order roller steps. The total number of roller steps which are dispensed during an operation is computed as [ u*65536 + U].

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get current setting for volume to pump in high order roller steps. The total number of roller steps which are dispensed during an operation is computed as [ u*65536 + U].

Command.Description: Set current setting for volume to pump in roller steps (greater than 65536).

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set current setting for volume to pump in roller steps (0 - 65536).

Response.Description: Roller Steps High order succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get the pump's current setting for roller step volume (RSV) based on the current calibration, tubing diameter and roller count in nL. If no calibration has been performed, the default volume is returned

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get the pump's current setting for roller step volume (RSV) based on the current calibration, tubing diameter and roller count in nL. If no calibration has been performed, the default volume is returned.

Command.Description: Set the calibrated roller step volume (RSV) in nL to use for this pump/channel. The value is used as calibration value and is overwritten by subsequent calibrations and reset by changing tubing diameter.

Parameter.Description: Channel

Set the calibrated roller step volume (RSV) in nL to use for this pump/channel. The value is used as calibration value and is overwritten by subsequent calibrations and reset by changing tubing diameter.

Response.Description: Roller Step Volume succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Reset the pump to discard calibration data, use default roller step volume

Parameter.Description: Reset the pump to discard calibration data, use default roller step volume

Response.Description: Roller Step Volume Reset succeeded.

Command.Description: Reset roller step value table to default

Parameter.Description: Reset roller step value table to default

Response.DisplayName: Reset Roller Step Volume Table Set
Response.Description: Reset Roller Step Volume Table succeeded.

Command.Description: Change factory roller step volume for a particular roller count and tubing size using roller count (6,8,12); index of the tubing diameter; RSV

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Gets roller count of the channel
Index of tubing diameter, see manual p.16 of 36)

Response.DisplayName: Set Non-Factory Roller Step Volume Set
Response.Description: Non-Factory Roller Step Volume succeeded.

Command.Description: Get current setting for pause time in 1/10 seconds

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get current setting for pause time in 1/10 seconds

Command.Description: Set current setting for pause time in 1/10 seconds

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set current setting for pause time in 1/10 seconds

Response.Description: Pause Time succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Set current setting for pause time in minutes (0-999)

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set current setting for pause time in minutes (0-999)

Response.Description: Pause Time succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Set current setting for pause time in hours (0-999)

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set current setting for pause time in hours (0-999)

Response.Description: Pause Time succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get total volume dispensed since the last reset in uL, mL or L.

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get total volume dispensed since the last reset in uL, mL or L.

Command.Description: Saves the current pump settings values to memory.

Parameter.Description: Pump Address

Response.Description: Saves the current pump settings values to memory.

Command.Description: Saves set roller step settings.

Parameter.Description: Pump Address

Response.Description: Saves set roller step settings.

Command.Description: Get the current status of the foot switch: - open / + grounded.

Parameter.Description: Pump Address

Response.Description: Get the current status of the foot switch: - open / + grounded..

Command.Description: Set number of rollers for channel

Parameter.Description: Gets the channel, on which the command will be executed
Set number of rollers for channel

Response.Description: Rollers Number succeeded to Set.

Command.Description: Get number of rollers for channel

Parameter.Description: Channel

Response.Description: Get number of rollers for channel.

Command.Description: Set pump serial number string.

Parameter.Description: Gets the pump, on which the command will be executed
Set pump serial number string.

Response.Description: Pump Serial Number succeeded to Set.

DefinedExecutionError.Description: The input value for language must be in range between 0 and 3.
The input value for ChannelAddressing must be boolean.
The input value for ChannelAddressing must be boolean.
